item.title: South Africa May Turn to Burning Heavy Fuel Oil to Tackle Load Shedding
item.description: South Africa May Turn to Burning Heavy Fuel Oil to Tackle Load Shedding South Africa is facing a severe power crisis, with rolling blackouts lasting up to 10 hours a day. The government is considering burning heavy fuel oil to generate electricity, as a temporary measure to ease the crisis.
